import { PickerProps } from '../types';


export const preparePickerHandler = <

	O extends Record<string, any>,

	K extends keyof O,

	T extends O[K]

>(

	params: Pick<PickerProps<T>, 'multiple' | 'onChange'>,

	key: K

) => <BODY preparePickerHandler>;


export const preparePickerSelectedValue = <

	O extends Record<string, any>,

	K extends keyof O,

	T extends O[K]

>(

	params: Pick<PickerProps<T>, 'multiple' | 'value'>,

	data: O[],

	key: K

) => <BODY preparePickerSelectedValue>;
answer: {"1": "Название файла должна быть в формате CamelCase"}
